akn:section.akn:heading: Authorization of Secretary of the Interior

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Operation of Center and Aquarium The Secretary of the Interior (hereinafter referred to as the “Secretary”) shall operate the National Fisheries Center and Aquarium.
